author: grapebaba
content: We don't know it, any issue/Pr discussed this?

author: jason.carver
content: I don't know of any dedicated issue covering this. I think it's implied by the client info being sent over the Ping Extensions, that it won't be necessary to send via the ENR anymore. But I don't know of any spec that's explicitly encouraging that anyone drop the `c` field.

author: kolbyml
content: The `c` field isn't specified, the `c` for all clients but trin only normally contains the clients name or some one letter char

author: grapebaba
content: https://github.com/ChainSafe/zig-discv5 a zig discv5 is under development
